name: Golden the Retriever
description:
Golden the Retriever is a brave dog who's job is to find and collect lost items.

Travel  space onboard the U.S.S. Lost & Found and help people of the earth.

Classic controls, press R to reload a level.

A game made in 48h  for the Global Game Jam 2021 (theme : Lost and Found) by :

- Léo Lefebvre (Game Design and Programming)
- Sacha Chouery (Game Design and Levels)
- Sophie Anteunis (Art)
- Flavien Maucourt (Sound Design and Music)
- Iida Halttunen (Music)

Have fun !
